Lightning_Bolt.help: You strike your target with a powerful lightning bolt from the sky, dealing energy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you.
Lightning_Bolt.targetHelp: Your recovery has been reduced and your endurance is being drained.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Ball_Lightning.help: A ball of electricity descends from the sky and erupts in a burst of electricity. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect and drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.targetHelp: Your recovery has been reduced and your endurance is being drained.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Gust_of_Wind.help: A powerful gust of wind saturates the air with life sustaining energy, healing yourself and allies. The force of the energy also protects those affected from sleep and stun effects for a short while.
Gust_of_Wind.shortHelp: Heal(Self and Allies), +Res(Sleep, Stun, Recovery, EndDrain)

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage and protects you from being put to sleep or stunned.

Summon_Storm.help: You create a powerful lightning storm at your target's location. This hits any targets caught within its area of effect on an ongoing basis, but can be avoided if the area is evacuated.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} creates a powerful {PowerName} at your location!
{PlayerSource} creates a powerful {PowerName} at your location!

Gale.help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Hurricane.help: You create a localized hurricane around yourself. The storm reduces the ability of targets to hit you with their attacks, reducing the effective range of ranged attacks and the to hit chance for all attacks. Additionally, the force of the storm is enough to knockback targets who approach too close.
Hurricane.targetHelp: Your chance to hit has been reduced. If you are a ranged attacker, the effective range of your attacks has also been reduced.

messages.victimHit: The range of your attacks has been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.
Your chance to hit has been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Thunderclap.help: You create a thunderous burst that stuns foes around you.
